title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\Intent\Message\BrowseCarouselCard
name: BrowseCarouselCard
description:
Browse Carousel Card for Actions on Google.

https://developers.google.com/actions/assistant/responses#browsing_carousel

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Intent.Message.BrowseCarouselCard

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.items
params.description: Required. List of items in the Browse Carousel Card. Minimum of two items, maximum of ten.

params.name: data.image_display_options
params.description: Optional. Settings for displaying the image. Applies to every image in [items][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Intent.Message.BrowseCarouselCard.items].
